A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand why some Star Wars fans may be disappointed with this film. I consider myself a fan and as a fan I will say that although I expected something a lot different from this movie\, I am also pleased to see that they’re taking risks as well\, some stronger than others. My biggest distaste comes from the comedy which at times felt forced\, however we are given a lot of interesting themes and intriguing plot points to look forward to in episode 9. Instead of hitting the same beats as always\, we get a deeper look into elements I didn’t think we’d go into depth with. It was suspenseful\, it was daring and it was a damn fine movie. I applaud Rian Johnson on taking the hard task of making “A Star Wars movie” which these days seems quite impossible. Not everyone will love this movie and I can tell it’ll be debated amongst fans for years to come but please do go see it\, I think there’s loads to unpack with this film.
